articles.description: Kansas City Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes spoke to the media via Zoom conference call on Wednesday. The Chiefs host the Atlanta Falcons on Sunday at Noon.

articles.title: Truth from Tyronn Lue sets the Clippers free against Lakers - Los Angeles Times
articles.description: Clippers coach Tyronn Lue says he strives to be truthful with his players. The approach helped during Tuesday's season opener against the Lakers.
articles.content:
Tyronn Lue learned one of the most important lessons of his NBA life early during his 11-year career from then-Lakers teammate Brian Shaw.
